title: LTTF T206 Cobb Bat Off PSA 3-4
author: awise1187

posts.post_title: LTTF T206 Cobb Bat Off PSA 3-4
posts.post_content: I am currently looking to trade any of these three cards plus/minus cash (depending on quality) for a T206 Sweet Cap or Piedmont Cobb Bat Off PSA 3-4 preferable in a new holder. If anyone has one they are willing to part with please reach out to see if we can make a deal. Email me at [url]wiseguycards@gmail.com[/url] or send me a PM to discuss further.
